import React from 'react' import Cam from '../img/icons8-cam-64.png' import More from '../img/icons8-more-48.png' import addUser from '../img/icons8-add-user-male-30.png' import Messages from './Messages' import Input from './Input' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ChatContext } from '../context/chatContext' function Chat() { const {data}= useContext(ChatContext); console.log(data) return (
{data.user.displayName}
) } export default Chat
